name: @dyondo/model
description: Openapi3 Model for Backend API for Dyondo muliti-user blogging platform

scripts.build: npm run merge && npm run validate
scripts.merge: (mkdir -p build && cd build && mkdir -p swagger)  && swagger-merger -i configuration/swagger/dyondo.yaml -o build/swagger/dyondo.api.yaml --debug

author: 4romgod
